text: ondu vele i kur‌an‌nindagi parvatagalu calisalarambhisiddare, bhumiyu chidravagiddare, athava savagalu matanadatodagiddare – agalu avaru nambuttiralilla. Nijavagi adhikaravellavu allahanige seride. Allahanu bayasiddare, ella manavarannu sanmargadalli nadesi biduttiddanu emba mahitiyinda visvasigalige nem'madisigalillave? Dhikkarigala karmagala phalavagi, allahana matu ideruva tanaka, avara mele athava avara nivasagala akka pakkadalli tivra vipattugalu eraguttale iruvavu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu tanu kotta matannu miruvudilla
